tools.locations.bigDataHint: Greater than or equal to 1000 points, prioritize using PointCollection; if unavailable, fall back to Canvas. Large data volumes will restrict polyline rendering.
tools.locations.dropHint: Drag and drop JSON / SQLite / CSV / GPX / KML files here to load
tools.locations.errStartAfterEnd: Start time cannot be later than end time
tools.locations.hintFormats: JSON/CSV: Requires time and latitude/longitude; GPX/KML automatically recognized; SQLite automatically detects tables and columns. Coordinates default to WGS84; if containing gcj02* or isMarsLocation, then use GCJ-02.
tools.locations.pageTitle: Track Preview (Time + Coordinates; Configurable Points/Lines, Massive Points Auto-Adapt | CSV/GPX/KML/SQLite)
tools.locations.panelHeaderTooltip: Double-click the title bar to collapse/expand
tools.locations.skipPolyline: Data volume {n} too large, polyline drawing skipped (threshold {limit}).
tools.locations.tipHttpServer: Tip: Please open via an http(s) local server (e.g., python -m http.server 8080) to avoid CORS errors under file://.
